net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.parallel

Class ParallelIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.parallel.ParallelIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ParallelIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class allows for creating indexes in a parallel manner. The class at hand reads files from the disk and acts as producer, while several consumer threads extract the features from the given files. To use this override the method addBuilders(net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.ChainedDocumentBuilder) to add your own features. Check the source of this class -- the main method -- to get an idea.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, 15.04.13
